google_translated: Connect and draw

en_text: Egaiteyuku To form the picture anata ga kureta deai to wakare mo the meetings and partings i've had with you
jp_text: あなたがくれた 出逢いと別れも
google_translated: Meeting and goodbye who gave me

en_text: Konna hazu ja nai "It can't be," I think
jp_text: こんなはずじゃない そう思って眠り
google_translated: I'm not so stupid and I'm sleeping

en_text: Mezamereba itsumo no When I awaken, just as always
jp_text: 目覚めればいつもの 変わらない空回り
google_translated: If you wake up, you can not always change

en_text: Imi mo naku kurikaeshi Pointlessly repeating the pattern
jp_text: 意味もなく繰り返し
google_translated: Repeat without meaning

en_text: Kako no uso mo ayamachi mo The lies and mistakes of the past
jp_text: 過去の嘘も過ちも
google_translated: Past lies and mistakes

en_text: Keshiteshimaitai to omoeba omou hodo As much as I'd like to erase them
jp_text: 消してしまいたいと想えば想うほど
google_translated: I want to erase it

en_text: Mou ichido yume wo So let's try regathering
jp_text: もう一度夢を拾い集めてみよう
google_translated: Let's collect dreams again

en_text: So that I can reshape the world to be what I want it to be...
jp_text: 俺が望む形にする為に
google_translated: In order to be in the shape that I want
